reference: This extremely complex dataset was generated from scratch.
title: Table of Playing Cards in 52-Card Deck
description:
Description
A table describing each of the 52 cards in a deck.

parameters.face_card: Whether the card counts as a face card.
parameters.suit: Card suit, which takes one of four values: Club, Diamond, Heart, or Spade.

format: A data frame with 52 observations on the following 2 variables.
